name: The Rainman
description:
Watch your back in the small peaceful town of Crystalpine Grove! This once criminal-free town is being haunted by numerous murders of young women. They believe it's the signature work of the infamous Rainman.

The full game is out now! Completely with 7 different endings!

Don't worry, the game is free to play!

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com and https://freesound.org
